oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Richard Moore Young's Bible
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A Bible belonging to Richard Moore Young. Young was born on April 1, 1842, in Putnam County, Tennessee. He served in the 28th Tennessee Infantry Regiment, C.S.A., of Putnam County. His family gave him the Bible when he left and he carried it throughout the war. He was paroled at Greensboro on May 1, 1865. Young was killed on April 12, 1865, by bushwhackers on his way home. He was buried at Young Watts Cemetery in Putnam County, Tennessee.
